attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To have free dental treatment and free prescriptions to all who work full time and pay weekly/monthly national insurance contibutions from their wages and for those unable to work thru disability/sickness,but those that claim benifits,who just can't be bothered to work should pay for their treatment/ prescriptions if they are fit to work.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
